DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to access conversion rate of TST (Tuberculin skin test) and Quantiferon-TB Gold In tube assay in health care workers.
DOC.brief_title: Conversion Rate of (TST) Tuberculin Skin Test and Quantiferon-TB Gold In Tube Assay in Health Care Workers
DOC.criteria: age 2075, men and women participant who was enrolled in the study of latent tuberculosis in health care worker (IRB No.420090187) high risk or low risk health care worker who was performed TST or QuantiferonTB Gold In tube assay before age < 20 person who don't agree with enrollment illiterate person who is diagnosed as active tuberculosis now person who has history of hypersensitivity on PPD (tuberculin purified protein derivative) pregnant woman person who is treated as active tuberculosis
DOC.keyword: latent tuberculosis in health care workers
